name: Shoot'n'Dash
description: Hello everyone! I have been working on this game for some days recently after the long hiatus I took from game development. I wanted to get back into it and start experimenting on new tools! While I plan on working more on this game. The tool I am going to use is still not fully chosen. I would like to get some feedback from you dear player on how does the game feel and does it look like a generic game so I can make it more unique and interesting.
